bike.description: �06 Fuse IV (20.75"), Full Cr-Mo, double-butted/formed 40mm TT/DT, tig weldeded, internaly relieved head tube w/ stamped badge and weld-on rotor plate, threaded Euro BB shell, tube BB yoke, 1pc CS, SS mounted brake bosses w/ dual lowr cables and SST DC Amplifier, 5mm forged/CNC'd 3D dropouts for 14mm axle w/ integrated chain tensioners

components.description: Full Cr-Mo, 1-1/8" threadless, Heat treated 1pc CNC Cr-Mo steer, Butted 1.8-1.2mm Cr-Mo 1-1/4" blades, 5mm Cr-Mo dropouts for 14mm axle w/ gussets
Tank FS, Nickel plated Cr-Mo cups
Specialized KO Lite, cold forged alloy, CNC relieved, top-load, 50mm reach with integrated rotor stops
Specialized 100% Cr-Mo 2-piece, 195mm rise x 620mm width, 10 degree backsweep, 5 degree upsweep
Fuse Kraton, dual file pattern, w/ micro flange and CNC'd alloy bar ends
Dia Tech 996 "Hombre" w/ "Fiesta Kit" and soft compond pads
Dia-Compe Tech 77, 2pc hinge clamp w/ forged alloy two finger lever
Odyssey 10t cog CNC'd driver for cassette hub
KMC 710 KOOL 1/2"x1/8"
Truvativ Luftalarm, forged AL-7050-TV, ISIS, L & R drive compatible, 175mm, self extracting bolts
Truvative CNC cut 7075 28t w/ bolt on grind plate
Truvativ Giga Pipe BMX, 4 bearing, alloy cups, ISIS spline
Specialized Lo-Pro Mag II, magnesium platform, 9/16" oversized heat treated Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, removable allen bolt pins
SUN City Light, 20", welded, eyelets, Blk front, CP rear
Fuse 36h, 14mm hollow axle, sealed cartridge bearing, mid flange
Fuse Cassette, 36h sealed 4x cartridge bearing cassette/hollow 14mm axles
2.0mm stainless, black w/brass nipples
Specialized Rhythm Pro, 20x2.1", dual compound, wire bead
Specialized Compound Pro, 20x2.0", Cap ply, dual compound, wire bead
Specialized 26x2.0" schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse SuperLight, Aramid sides, SuperLite Foam, 9mm hollow Cr-Mo rails with X-Brace, front and rear PU handles

forged and CNC'd alloy, single bolt
